text: Martin Leach-Cross Feldman (January 28, 1934 â€“ January 27, 2022) was an American Republican politician and lawyer. He was the United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of Louisiana from 1983 until 2022. He was nominated to the court by President Ronald Reagan. Feldman was born in St. Louis, Missouri. Feldman died on January 27, 2022 in New Orleans, Louisiana, one day before his 88th birthday.US District Court Judge Martin Feldman has died, wdsu.com; accessed January 28, 2022. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American judges Category:Lawyers from New Orleans Category:Politicians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Politicians from New Orleans Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from St. Louis, Missouri
title: Martin Leach-Cross Feldman
